resources.string:
To use this application, you must set your VoIP.ms portal email address, API password, and an SMS-enabled DID in Settings. If you do not know what an API password is, see Help.

By default, the message retrieval start date is set to today. If you wish to receive messages older than this, you can change this date in Settings.

You may also wish to enable push notifications. For more information, see Help.

Could not update the SMS database because the VoIP.ms API response could not be parsed. (update_smses_parse)
Could not update the SMS database because the VoIP.ms API returned an error. (update_smses_api_

Database synchronization failed. A request to the VoIP.ms API failed. (101)
Database synchronization failed. The VoIP.ms API response could not be parsed. (102)
Database synchronization failed. The VoIP.ms API returned an error: {error}. (103)

Failed to retrieve DIDs. A request to the VoIP.ms API failed. (201)
Failed to retrieve DIDs. The VoIP.ms API response could not be parsed. (202)
Failed to retrieve DIDs. The VoIP.ms API returned the following error: {error}. (203)
You must set your VoIP.ms portal email address and API password before selecting a DID. (204)
You must set your VoIP.ms portal email address and API password before selecting a DID. (205)
There are no DIDs in your VoIP.ms account. (206)
Retrieve only messages from VoIP.ms dated after the most recent message stored locally
Retrieve messages from VoIP.ms that were deleted locally
Delete messages from VoIP.ms that were deleted locally
Delete messages stored locally that were deleted from VoIP.ms
Enable push notifications using the developer\'s Google Cloud Messaging server
Delete all messages stored locally (to prepare for later message importation or retrieval)
